name: Tapestry: Le Repas de Sancho dans l'Ile de Barataria, from L'Histoire de don Quichotte Series
maker: Woven at the Royal Factory of Furniture to the Crown at the Gobelins Manufactory, under the direction of Michel Audran, and his son Jean Audran fils, et al
description: Tapestry: Le Repas de Sancho dans l'Ile de Barataria, from L'Histoire de don Quichotte Series; Woven at the Royal Factory of Furniture to the Crown at the Gobelins Manufactory (French, founded 1662 - present), under the direction of Michel Audran (French, 1701 - 1771), and his son Jean Audran fils (French, died 1794, active Gobelin Manufactory 1771 - 1794), et al; Gobelins, France; 1770 - 1772; Wool and silk; modern cotton lining; 370.8 × 507.5 cm (146 × 199 13/16 in.); 82.DD.67; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Tapestry: Le Repas de Sancho dans l'Ile de Barataria, from L'Histoire de don Quichotte Series
medium: Wool and silk; modern cotton lining
